snippet: The Juilliard School presentation of Bach’s “St. Matthew Passion” included the Choir of Trinity Wall Street and the conductor Gary Thor Wedow.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews concert of Bach's St Matthew Passion, performed by Juilliard415 orchestra and featuring Choir of Trinity Wall Street, at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Juilliard School presentation of Bach’s “St. Matthew Passion” included the Choir of Trinity Wall Street and the conductor Gary Thor Wedow.

headline.seo: Bach’s ‘St. Matthew Passion,’ Presented by Juilliard
headline.main: In a Show of Early-Music Vigor, a Lofty Commitment Is Confirmed
headline.print_headline: In a Show of Early-Music Vigor, a Lofty Commitment Is Confirmed
